bill_title: authorize a full-time position in the Board of Regents central office dedicated to American Indian education and outreach and to make an appropriation therefor.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize a full-time position in the Board of Regents central office dedicated to American Indian education and outreach and to make an appropriation therefor. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of sixty-five thousand dollars ($65,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Board of Regents to fund one full-time position to staff an American Indian education and outreach program focused on educating American Indian high school students and their families about becoming college ready and navigating college application and admission processes. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
